name: .dqc.constructcheck
descrip: Used to check if a construct exists
return: Return boolean and if the construct exists

name: .dqc.tableticking
descrip: Used to check if a table has obtained records within a specified time period
return: Return boolean and how many records where in the time specified

name: .dqc.chkslowsub
descrip: Used to check queues on handles to make sure there is no slow subscribers
return: Return boolean and list of any slow subscribers

name: .dqc.tablecount
descrip: Used to check a table count against a number. This can be a check of > = or <
return: Return boolean and the count of the table

name: .dqc.tablehasrecords
descrip: A projection of .dqe.tablecount that is used to check if a table has records
return: Return boolean and the count of the table

name: .dqc.attrcheck
descrip: Used to check if a table's schema matches expectation
return: Return boolean and if attribute matches

name: .dqc.anomalychk
descrip: Used to check percentage of anomalies in list of columns of table
return: Returns table with percentage of anomalies per column and if it is below threshold

name: .dqc.freeform
descrip: Used to check if query has passsed correctly
return: Return boolean and whether query passed

name: .dqc.schemacheck
descrip: Used to check if meta of table matches expectation
return: Return boolean and if schema matches

name: .dqc.datechk
descrip: Used to check that date vector contains latest date in an hdb
return: Returns 1b if dates match else returns 0b if dates do not match or if directory is not partitioned or if date is not a partition field

name: .dqc.nullchk
descrip: Used to check percentage of nulls in list of columns of table
return: Returns table with percentage of nulls per column and if it is below threshold

name: .dqc.symfilecheck
descrip: Used to check if sym file exists
return: Returns boolean and if sym file exists

name: .dqc.xmarketalert
descrip: Used to check if bid price has exceeded the ask in market data
return: Returns boolean and whether the price has exceeded

name: .dqc.dfilechk
descrip: Used to check the .d file in latest date matches previous date values
return: Returns 1b if files match or if there is only one partition else returns 0b if files do not match or if directory is not partitioned or if there are no two files for the table

name: .dqc.rangechk
descrip: Used to check whether values of columns from prespecified list are within the range
return: Returns table with percentage of values within range per column and if it is below threshold
